interacte.saveTranscript: {success.emote} Successfully saved your transcript. You can download it now. (Web-hosted is not currently supported)

muteRole.set: {success.emote} Successfully set your Mute Role to %c.

autoblacklist.set: {success.emote} Successfully set up Auto-Blacklist for this server.
autoblacklist.delete: {success.emote} Successfully deleted Auto-Blacklist for this server.

whitelistroles.add: {success.emote} Successfully added the role %c to the whitelist.

ticket.deletedTicket: {info.emote} This Ticket will be deleted in 5 seconds...

info.title: Auto-Blacklist
info.description: This is a list of all the users that have been auto-blacklisted.

fields.name: How to set up Auto-Blacklist?
fields.value: To set up Auto-Blacklist, you need to create a announcement channel, add a blacklist webhook and set it up with the command `/autoblacklist set <channel> [ban_message]`

fields.name: How to use Auto-Blacklist?
fields.value: You don't need to do anything. If a message is send through the webhook, all user ids in the message will be banned.

fields.name: How to remove Auto-Blacklist?
fields.value: To remove Auto-Blacklist, you need to use the command `/autoblacklist delete`

fields.name: **IMPORTANT**
fields.value: **Due a bug in Discord.js, every message will be detected. Not only the ones send through the webhook.**

error.general: {error.emote} There was an error processing your request. {general.tryAgainLater}

embed.send: {error.emote} There was an error sending your embed message. {general.tryAgainLater}

setting.delete: {error.emote} There was an error deleting your Ticket Setting. {general.tryAgainLater}

ticket.MAX_SETTINGS: {error.emote} You have reached the maximum number of tickets (%c)

interacte.create: {error.emote} There was an error creating your ticket. {general.tryAgainLater}
interacte.close: {error.emote} There was an error closing your ticket. {general.tryAgainLater}
interacte.hasTicketAlready: {error.emote} You already have a ticket open.

muteRole.set: {error.emote} There was an error setting your Mute Role. {general.tryAgainLater}
muteRole.remove: {error.emote} There was an error removing your Mute Role. {general.tryAgainLater}

set.alreadySet: {error.emote} Auto-Blacklist is already set up for this server! Delete it first.

delete.notSet: {error.emote} Auto-Blacklist is not set up for this server!

whitelistroles.alreadyExists: {error.emote} You already have the role %c on the whitelist. If you want to remove it use the optional argument `remove`.

user.useCommand: {error.emote} You don't have permission to use this command.

permissions.write: {error.emote} I don't have permission to write in.
permissions.channelDelete: {error.emote} I don't have permission to delete channels.
